subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Ann's files/Lincoln_talking_stroking_past_032508.wav 
  Uploaded by : lisbyfarrum <lisby@...> 
  Description : When I was kid, I had a dream about being in a boat with Lincoln, he was paddling in the dark under a bunch of stars. He gave a ring to wear and he told me he'd always see me safe home. I've always remembered the dream. Now I get, "Lincoln talking, stroking past." 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Ann%27s%20files/Lincoln_talking_stroking_past_032508.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

lisbyfarrum <lisby@...>
